explains: n. 多样性，多样化；不同，差异
wordGroup: species diversity 物种多样性；歧异度
biological diversity 生物多样性；生物差异
diversity index 多样性指数；歧异度指数
ecological diversity 生态多样性；生态分岐度

sentences.en: Two of our greatest strengths are diversity and community.
sentences.cn: 我们的两个最大优点是多样性和团体精神。

sentences.en: There is a need for greater diversity and choice in education.
sentences.cn: 教育方面需要更加多元化和更大的选择性。

sentences.en: We have nothing against diversity; indeed, we want more of it.
sentences.cn: 我们并不反对多样化；其实，我们希望有更多的多样化。
